subproject.description:
1.1: ECP mainstreaming guidelines and indicators developed and available for use by sectors.
1.2: Poverty-Environment linkages demonstrated and benefit sharing policies, mechanisms and guidelines developed.
1.3: Staff and modules available for ECP mainstreaming trainings at all level in relevant trainings educational and training institutes.
1.4: Capacity of staff in relevant sectors including ECP Reference Group to mainstream ECP strengthened.
1.5: Capacity of CSOs and private sectors to mainstream ECP strengthened.
2.1: Local Development Planning Manual (LDPM) Revised with integration of ECP concerns, and available for use by LG.
2.2: Benefit Sharing mechanisms applied in selected sites.
2.3: Capacity at local level to mainstream ECP strengthened.
2.4: Periodic monitoring practice set up to support integration of ECP into local plans.
subproject.title: Joint Support Programme
